title: SBox-1.2 XP-based VMware image incl. privacy apps
description:
1] Intro
---------

SBox is a WindowsXP-based VMware image configured for online privacy.
When this image is mounted (using VMware Workstation) it will provide
a virtual PC running Windows XP, and 20+ esential application.
The total size of SBox-1.2 installation is 1.4 GB.


[2] Included application
------------------------

AVG 7.5 : abtivirus
CCleaner : system cleaner
Eraser : secure delete
Forte Agent : news reader
InfranView : image viewer
Thunderbird : email client
O&O Defrag : disk defragmenter
PGP 6.5.8ctk : safe communication
PeerGuardian2 : IP blocker
QuickPar : repair downloaded files
RegCure : registry cleaner
R-Studio : file recovery
Spybot S&D : add/mallware eliminator
Kerio Personal Firewal : firewall
Vidalia (Tor, Privoxy) : anonymizer
VLC : video player
WinRAR : compress/decompress
Internet Explorer 7 : MS browser
Metapad : text editor
Firefox : Mozzila browser
uTorrent : P2P application

...

6] Support:
------------

Please post your comments, suggestions, corrections... to the news group
alt.privacy, use "SBox" in the subject. We will keep updating SBox as long
as there is a community interessted in using the package.


[7] Credits:
------------

We would like to thanks to all TPB uploaders who contributed the applications
included in this packages.
